query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as user_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM initiatives) as initiative_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM votes) as vote_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments) as comment_count;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as user_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM initiatives) as initiative_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM votes) as vote_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments) as comment_count;
